title: Dear Gabby, How Do I Handle the Fear of the World?
description:
Do you feel powerless about what’s going on in the world? This Dear Gabby is for you. This very special episode features my talk with a Polish psychologist who’s determined to help people stay spiritually resilient while witnessing the war in Ukraine. I was honored to answer her questions about how to be the light in times of darkness—whether that darkness is a catastrophic war, a personal loss or a breakup. This episode is packed with powerful techniques for keeping hope alive in yourself and sharing that hope with others.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

 

Joanna Chmura is a psychologist who names courage as her speciality. Through her individual and group counseling services—and through her Story to Tell podcast—Joanna gives people the support they need to lead courageous lives. You can learn more about my extraordinary new friend here. 

 
In this episode of Dear Gabby, I reference two of my books. The Universe Has Your Back is about transforming fear into faith, and it couldn’t be more relevant for today’s topic. https://bit.ly/3B9lALA

 

Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace is for anyone who’s ready to do some deeper work to liberate themselves from trauma. This book delves more into the eight qualities of Self that I touch upon in this episode. It’s also available as an audiobook from Audible. https://bit.ly/3Q5R0Hh


Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new lessons, guided meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, there’s a different 21-day challenge each quarter. The membership’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join.https://bit.ly/3PAJ5BW


If you are in need of safety, recovery or mental health resources, please consult this list. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3ROvMiJ


I intend for this podcast to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological  or medical conditions, please seek help from  a qualified health professional.

 

For listeners of the show, Calm is offering a special limited time promotion of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/deargabby

 

Evlo usually offers a 14-day trial but is extending the free trial to 30 days for our listeners with the code GABBY at checkout. Visit evlofitness.com to learn more and try their membership for 30 days with the code GABBY. Workout smarter, not harder.

 

Right now, Hungryroot is offering Dear Gabby listeners 30% off your first delivery and free veggies for life. Just go to Hungryroot.com/GABBY.

 

Ready to shake up your protein Ritual? My listeners get 10% off during your first 3 months at ritual.com/DEARGABBY

 

Produced by Dear Media.
